features.html: The question refers to the two images shown.

choicesHtml: customary laws that transferred the ownership of each object’s design to its individual patron
rules enforced by Australian governors which regulated the production of Malagan objects
rules that prescribed the usage of certain colors and patterns based on the patron’s social status
customs that restricted the artist to the use of traditional designs that were specific to his family
